Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Casper's life prior to or as the outbreak began.
Post-Apocalypse[]: At some point in the apocalypse, Casper joined a community called the Hilltop Colony . Casper, Hilde , Miles , and Martin leave Hilltop for the fair in a horse-drawn wagon. On their way, they are ambushed by Alpha and killed. At night, a zombified Casper is found in the woods by Daryl, Michonne , Carol , and Yumiko . Before he can attack anyone, he is shot in the head with an arrow by Yumiko.
Death[]: Killed By The Whisperers (Alive) Casper is ambushed in the woods by the Whisperers and is killed. Yumiko Okumura (Zombified) A zombified Casper is shot in the head with an arrow by Yumiko.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Casper has killed: Numerous counts of zombies
Trivia[]: Despite the fact that both Casper and Martin are named characters who died in " The Calm Before ", neither of them were featured during the "In Memoriam" segment of that week's episode of Talking Dead . Casper is the first named character who is killed by Yumiko Okumura in the TV Series , albeit zombified.
